## Overview

Co-President of [Women in Strategy Association at BYU](https://wsabyuteam.wixsite.com/byuwsa), empowering women pursuing careers in business strategy and consulting. I manage the organization's [website](https://wsabyuteam.wixsite.com/byuwsa), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/wsa_byu/), and all social media channels, and lead strategic direction, community building, and member engagement initiatives.

**Role:** Co-President

**Organization:** [WSA at BYU](https://wsabyuteam.wixsite.com/byuwsa)

**Focus:** Website management, social media, leadership, community building

## What I Do

I lead strategic direction and growth for WSA while overseeing all digital presence and marketing efforts. This includes managing our website and social media, developing programming for professional development, building partnerships with industry professionals, and creating authentic engagement opportunities for members.

**Key areas:**

- Website management and digital presence
- Social media strategy and content across all platforms
- Organizational vision and strategic priorities
- Community building and member engagement
- Professional development programming and industry partnerships
